Text: ...I'm bored.

...As was our initial plan, the Shadow Garden has
been able to establish a firm foothold in the Velgalta
Empire.

Mitsugoshi has also broken ground on a large
storefront in a prime location within the imperial
capital—

By making large-scale investments in a transport
network within the empire, we can take a leading role
in domestic and foreign distribution for Velgalta.

What's more, now that a way to defeat Malak has been
discovered, we can likely expect great progress in
our surveys of the oil fields near Madlid.

And now that it's possible to station both combat and
covert operatives on a permanent basis, we'll be
able to obtain intel on the local Cult of Diablos
whenever we need.

Paired with our base in the City States, exchanging
essential resources will go much more smoothly.

Simply judging by the results, I think we can say
that Velgalta has been a big win for us—
...But tasks and mysteries also remain.
One is our glaring inexperience as a group.

As with the Mist Dragon...we were unable to bring
this latest plan to a proper close without Shadow's
aid.

If it weren't for our lord, Sergey would have eluded
us, and likely proved a major hindrance to any future
strategies and operations.

It would undoubtedly have affected the future of the
Shadow Garden by forcing a large shift in our
objectives.

Budgets would be slashed...and we may have lost all
that oil...!
Urrrgh... I'm bored, Lady Alphaaa!

And then...there's the matter of the elven
swordswoman—
Awoo...!

...Even the dumb dog is having a hard time.
But honestly, the thought of going up against that
swordswoman again makes my blood run cold.

Who is she? And what is her connection to the Cult of
Diablos, to that facility?

We should consider that she is an obstacle that
ultimately cannot be avoided in the course of our
investigations...

...In our current state, we do not have the strength
to get past her!
Delta?!
No! That's not true!
If she's strong...then we get stronger! And beat her!

There you go with that tough talk again—even though
you're scared too.
Shut it, you scaredy cat!
...We get stronger! Problem solved!
So you say, but...

If that stupid dark knight gets in the way, we hunt
her like anybody else!
Delta... It's not that simple—
No, maybe it is that simple, Beta.
Lady Alpha?!
...We'll get stronger.

We'll lurk in the shadows and be reborn, more
powerful than before, both as individuals and
as an organization—

Which is to say, that growth is absolutely essential
to the future of the Shadow Garden.
So basically, we simply need to get stronger!

We and the organization need to get on a level where
we can take down our prey without using our lord as
a crutch—that's the gist of it.

All of us...will become more powerful... And that...
will require research funds... Heehee.

Let's review our organizational structure and make
the appropriate changes. All for the strategy and
growth of the Garden as well!
...I dunno about all that stuff—
But I do know I'm gonna pack on the power!

And then I'm gonna lay a beating on that dark knight
that looks just like Lady Alpha! Arrrooooo!!!
